com.google.bitcoin.crypto

Class BIP38PrivateKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.bitcoin.core.VersionedChecksummedBytes
      • com.google.bitcoin.crypto.BIP38PrivateKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BIP38PrivateKey
extends VersionedChecksummedBytes
    Implementation of BIP 38 passphrase-protected private keys. Currently, only decryption is supported.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
